channel.title: Scripting News
channel.description: Dave Winer, OG blogger, podcaster, developed first apps in many categories. Old enough to know better. It's even worse than it appears.

image.title: Scripting News
image.description: Scripting News gets an image because it's part of a network that uses them. 6/4/25 by DW

item.description: Podcast. It's time for things to change. Two examples, Wired and Harvard. Change was always coming, but now you can't turn away from it very long before it re-appears.

source:outline.text: Podcast. It's time for things to change. Two examples, Wired and Harvard. Change was always coming, but now you can't turn away from it very long before it re-appears.

item.description: Welcome to August. More than half the summer is behind us. We're still here. The shelves in the supermarkets are full of good stuff. We've had about the normal amount of hot weather, a good amount of rain but not too much. The Mets are doing OK. They opened a Pho restaurant in Bearsville and it's good. Health, not too bad, all things considered. Still diggin!
